name: a simple game (Natfinx)
description:
I have more ideas for the game but vacation is over. I will try to add and upload them when I have some spare time.

It's the first time I upload something, I don't know if putting all my python files and the images I used in the zip file was the way to go but the executable doesn't run properly otherwise

The arts aren't mine so credits to all the artists

Feedbacks are welcomed
